item.title: Major trucking company closes Home Depot distribution facility
item.description: One of the top U.S. trucking companies will shut down a major distribution center at the end of October.

item.title: Amazon is selling a 5-drawer dresser for $29 right now
item.description: Save space and store sweaters, shirts, and more with ease.

item.title: Walmart quietly introduces new delivery option for customers
item.description: Walmart is continuing to bet big on delivery to attract more shoppers.

item.title: Walmart is selling a 'very sturdy' storage shed for just $77
item.description: This canopy shed is a great option for smaller spaces that provides ample storage space.

item.title: Electronic Arts buyout may be loudest edge public rivals ever get
item.description: As Electronic Arts goes quiet under private equity, rivals could potentially exploit the gap.
